General.Name: CR2 Empreendimentos Imobiliários S.A
General.Description: CR2 Empreendimentos Imobiliários S.A., together with its subsidiaries, operates as a real estate developer in Rio de Janeiro and São Paulo, Brazil. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Pastor Martin Luther King Jr., Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil

AddressData.Street: Av. Pastor Martin Luther King Jr.
